featured.text: In 1931, members of the Rotary Clubs of Alberta and Montana suggested joining the two parks as a symbol of peace and friendship between the two countries.

definition.zh_def: 一種社交或娛樂的組織，通常由一群人組成，並定期舉行活動或聚會。
definition.en_def: An organization or group of people who meet regularly for social or recreational activities.
definition.example: She joined a book club to meet new friends and discuss her favorite novels.
